name: Baby Pet Daycare
description:
Take care of pets in your very own daycare! Care for the animals by feeding them, washing them, & much more. These cute fuzzy animals need someone to love them. Are you up for the task?

Features:
- Dog, Cat, Monkey, Bunny
- Lots of ways to take care of the pets
- Loads of mini games to play with each pet
- Learn responsibility
- Fun for kids and adults of all ages
- Free to Play
- Much, Much more!
